desc: Thriller. Gary Oldman stars as a British Secret Service agent brought out of retirement to track down a defector at the head of Ml6. Violent scenes/strong language/sexual scenes.
title: Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy

desc: Animated deep sea adventures with Captain Barnacles and his explorers. Tweak and her crewmates must convert the Gup-F into an artificial reef.
subtitle: Artificial Reef
title: New: Octonauts

desc: Liam experiences the symptoms of post-traumatic stress disorder. Annie is angry with Naomi when she tracks down their half-brother Mark.
subtitle: Brother from Another Mother

desc: Animated deep sea adventures with Captain Barnacles and his explorers. When a sardine swallows an important key, a humpback whale helps Kwazii track it down.
subtitle: Humpback Whales
title: New: Octonauts

desc: Animated deep sea adventures with Captain Barnacles and his explorers. A floating garbage patch endangers a flock of pelicans and other sea creatures.
subtitle: Pelicans
title: New: Octonauts

desc: Animated deep sea adventures with Captain Barnacles and his explorers. The Octonauts must stop a huge herd of sea pigs before they march blindly into the Mariana Trench.
subtitle: Sea Pigs
title: New: Octonauts

desc: Spencer is still reeling from rejection by Caggie when he sees her on a date with Thomas. Ollie is forging ahead with his book and decides to do a chapter on virginity.
title: Made In Chelsea

desc: Animated deep sea adventures with Captain Barnacles and his explorers. A yeti crab damages the ship, endangering itself and the Octonauts.
subtitle: Yeti Crab
title: New: Octonauts

desc: Highlights including Manchester United v Crystal Palace and Aston Villa v Newcastle. Also in HD.  Followed by National Lottery Update.
title: Match of the Day
